about_the_game:
Join Pippa Pillowfeather in her bid to escape the Fluffquake Fury before Bedtime!

She must use her pillow to whack, spin and jump her way through various bedroom skirmishes before the lights go out!

This is the debut release from novice developer JustAlexGames!

Play as Pippa Pillowfeather, the cute and feisty young pillow whacking girl who's dressed ready for bed - but has no intention of closing the curtains until she's defeated all the baddies in the bedroom! Lights are out soon, so she has to use her pillow to whack 'em fast before its too late!

She starts off in her own bedroom and once the Mousey is defeated a new room will be unlocked. The challenges get tougher and tougher as she unlocks more rooms until the corridor is complete and she's granted with a new Pillow Spin ability!

The next world is her Mum and Dad's room - she really shouldn't be in there but there's many, many new baddies to conquer first!

Next is a hotel - with some really tricky situations in the rooms and corridor! There's even a lift you can use to explore the basement, stock up on health and strength and escape from the nasty green smoke that comes when you throw one of your new poison pillows!

If you survive all that, then there's one final boss to conquer! He is armed with devastating exploding pillows and is weaving in and out of falling beds as he runs to the finish line!

Enjoy playing this simple, quick, light hearted game - the debut game from JustAlexGames.

Music composed by the developer - I challenge you to keep the theme out of your head!

short_description: A light-hearted, fun, simple RPG where you play as bedroom hero Pippa Pillowfeather and try and beat lights out by using her Pillow to defeat any monsters in the bedroom! Use new pillow attack abilities as she progresses to different bedroom scenes.
